name: Turret Blitz
description:
This is the first game I've ever made and my submission to the Itch.io My First Game Jam: Winter 2017

TURRET BLITZ

A fast paced split-screen twin stick shooter where the goal is to get one of your units into the enemy base!

You make units through spending points and you gain point by destroying the enemy and taking over turrets.

You use the buttons in your base to deploy your units using the Action Button. This button is also used to take over neutral turrets in the arena.

Or save your points to buy a Super Tank and show your enemy you know business!

POINTS

1 Point for destroying a tank

1 Point for destroying a turret

10 Points for destroying the enemy player

5 Points for destroying a Super Tank

CONTROLS

Left Stick - Movement

Right Stick - Firing direction

LB/L1 Button - Action Button

Select - Quits the Game

System Requirements

Low spec PC

2 Gamepads (Xbox 360, Xbox One, PS4 etc)

Keyboard and mouse is NOT supported at this time

There are bugs and issues some that I am aware of and other that I probably aren't please feel free to pass these on. I intend to continue development of this prototype and feedback will definitely be taken onboard. If there is anyone out there who is interested in helping with the project please get in touch!
